o_sentence: The borrower MUST keep minimum liquidity of $150 million.
p_sentence: The borrower MAY request a waiver provided that no event of default has occurred.

o_sentence: The borrower MUST maintain an interest coverage ratio above 3.0x across all secured loans.
p_sentence: The borrower MAY incur secured debt subject to lender approval unless a default exists.

o_sentence: The company MUST maintain a minimum unrestricted cash balance of $100 million.
p_sentence: The company MAY borrow additional funds subject to covenant compliance unless the fixed charge coverage ratio falls below 1.5x.
